loop-tracking-category-error: Name of the LOOP default error tracking category
loop-tracking-category-error-desc: Description of the LOOP default error tracking category
specialpages-group-loop: name of the special pages category for loop
loopstructure-specialpage-title: Page title for LOOP Structure special page
loopstructure-edit-specialpage-title: Page title for editing Loop Structure special page
loopstructure: Name of the LOOP structure special page in special:specialpages
loopstructureedit: Name of editing the LOOP structure special page in special:specialpages
loop-token-error: Error message when the users edit token is invalid
loop-permission-error: Error message, user has no permission
loopstructure-save-equal-error: Error message when the user saves a unchanged structure
loopstructure-save-parsed-structure-erro: Error message occurs when the parsed structure content is empty
loopstructure-save-parse-error: Parse error for the LOOP strucutre
loopstructure-save-success: Saving succes of the LOOP structure
loopsettings: Name of the LOOP settings special page in special:loopsettings
loopsettings-specialpage-title: Page title for LOOP Settings special page
loopsettings-no-permission: Error message, user has no permission to view this page
loopsettings-use-cc-label: Label for option to use Creative Commons license checkbox
loopsettings-imprint-label: Label for imprint page input field
loopsettings-privacy-label: Label for privacy page input field
loopsettings-extra-footer-label: Label for additional footer checkbox and input field
loopsettings-extra-footer-placeholder: Placeholder for additional footer textfield. Hint for Wikitext
loopsettings-link-icon-label: Label for social icon input fields
loopsettings-upload-hint: Hint for users to inform about the ability to use previously and newly uploaded files.
loopsettings-customlogo-hint: Hint for custom logo input field
loopsettings-error-customlogo-notfound: Error message, given filename not uploaded / found
loopsettings-headline-important-links: Headline on settings page, important links
loopsettings-headline-extrafooter: Headline on settings page, extra footer
loopsettings-headline-footer-links: Headline on settings page, footer links
loopsettings-headline-skinstyle: Headline on settings page, skin style
loopsettings-tab-general: Tab name on settings page, general
loopsettings-tab-footer: Tab name on settings page, footer
loopsettings-tab-appearance: Tab name on settings page, appearance
loopsettings-url-imprint-privacy-hint: Hint for imprint and privacy input field. URL required or page in LOOP as /loop/page
loopsettings-error: Error message after server-side validation failing
loopexport-specialpage-title: Page title for Loop Export special page
loopexport: Name of Specialpage Export in List of Specialpages
right-loop-export-pdf: Right to export LOOP as PDF
right-loop-export-xml: Right to export LOOP as XML
right-loop-export-mp3: Right to export LOOP as MP3
right-loop-export-epub: Right to export LOOP as ePub
right-loop-export-html: Right to export LOOP as Offline HTML
right-loop-export-scorm: Right to export LOOP as Scorm
export-linktext-xml: Linktext to download LOOP in export format XML
export-linktext-pdf: Linktext to download LOOP in export format PDF
